metadata.title: A Quitter Never Wins
metadata.songInfo: by Tinsley Ellis / Margaret Sampson recording of 1997 from Lie To Me (Aamp;M 540640) ,

xml.lyrics:
Seems like now days ain#146;t nothin#146; meant to last one day you#146;ve got it all and then it disappears so fast, and you know our love is on and off again Well I know you wanna quit me, baby, but a quitter never wins
Well, you#146;ve walked out on our lovin#146;, but I#146;ve stayed through thick and thin, and you know our love is on and off again I know you want to quit me, but a quitter never wins
Seems like now days love is a word that no one means Ya said you#146;d never leave me, then ya upped and walked right out on me, and now our love is on and off again Well, I know you wanna quit me, but a quitter never wins
Well, I know you wanna quit me baby But a quitter never wins, a quitter never wins
